name: Bharat Heavy Electricals Limited
description: Bharat Heavy Electricals Limited (BHEL) is a leading public sector engineering and manufacturing company in India, primarily engaged in the power generation and transmission sector. Established in 1964, BHEL has been instrumental in the growth of the power sector in India and has emerged as a global player in various industrial segments. The company is known for its comprehensive range of products and services, which include power generation equipment for thermal, hydro, and gas-based power plants, as well as renewable energy solutions such as solar and wind energy. BHEL also provides a wide array of industrial products, including transformers, switchgear, and electrical machines. The company is committed to innovation and sustainability, focusing on research and development to enhance the efficiency and reliability of its products. BHEL has a robust manufacturing infrastructure with several plants across India and a strong presence in international markets, exporting its products and services to over 80 countries. The company plays a vital role in India's energy security and infrastructure development, contributing to the nation's economic growth and environmental sustainability.
